post:
We are proud to offer you plans from our ByteShack range. ByteShack platform was designed to fulfill gap with high speed disk arrays on Low End market. 

We achieved that with combination of CPU power and super fast SSD disk arrays. Result is speaking for it self. We achieved read and write speed comparable to biggest name in the industry for fraction of the price.

Speed in combination with fast and friendly support gives you production ready environment for all your disk demanding tasks.
High traffic website with heavy DB, we are here for you, challenge our ByteShack platform to help you in your business.

All plans are running on 6 drives HW Raid 10 configuration. All nodes are monitored 24/7.

**Provisioning is manual and it is not instant**

    XEN PV
    Dallas Location
    2 shared CPU cores
    384 MB RAM
    7 GB HW raid 10 SSD (6 drives array)
    500 GB BW
    1Gbps shared port
    2 IPv4
    10 IPv6
    Sale price $3.7 USD P/M or $32 USD P/Y

**[Order Link](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=133)**

    DC Info:
    Datacenter: QueryFoundry TX
    Address: 1950 N Stemmons Fwy #1000, Dallas, TX 75207
    Test IPv4: 38.68.13.24
    Bandwidth providers: Internap, PCCW, Cogent

-------------------------------------

We are happy to offer you newest addition to our XenStorage plans. VPS shaped to provide you decent storage, sufficient ram and guaranteed resources.

Service is hosted on Dual E5 2620 with 128 GB. Disk setup is consisting of 8 drives RAID 6 array.

**Provisioning is manual and it is not instant**

    XS - WBP#1 - XEN PV
    Chicago Location
    4 Shared CPU Cores
    512 MB RAM
    1 GBPS Uplink
    1x IPv4 and 3x IPv6
    1 TB Transfer
    Virtualizor Panel
    150 GB RAID6 Storage
    Sale price $4.80 P/M or $39.99 P/Y

**[Order Link](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=135)**

    DC Info:
    Chicago Equinix 
    Transit Providers: NLAYER and PCCW
    Test IP: 208.68.208.5

If you wish to have friendly support, fair service and transparency we are here for you.
drserver.net is family driven business with sustainable business model.
Currently we are serving more than 1000 happy customers.

**Cheap is not excuse for bad !**
